title: CHLOR LIQUID
long_description: CHLOR is a not stabilized sanitizer for pool water. Its chlorine-based formula disinfects water by efficiently destroying bacteria and algae. CHLOR is not stabilized and must be used in combination with STAB to withstand the sun’s ultraviolet rays.
short_description: BENEFIT Controls bacteria and algae in swimming pool water FORMAT 3.6L

characteristics.title: Application method
characteristics.text: Pour CHLOR LIQUID directly into the water, all around the pool.

characteristics.title: Instructions
characteristics.text: Add CHLOR LIQUID according to the application method.

dosage.specifications: Initially, superchlorinate** pool water by adding 1 L of CHLOR LIQUID per 10,000 L of pool water. For best results, superchlorinate at dusk. Chlorinate daily or as needed with 250 mL of CHLOR LIQUID per 10,000 L of pool water to maintain proper chlorine residual. Superchlorinate** weekly with 1 L of CHLOR LIQUID per 10,000 L of pool water when average daily temperature is between 25°C and 32°C. Otherwise, superchlorinate every other week. For visible algae, superchlorinate** using 2 L of CHLOR LIQUID per 10,000 L of pool water. Heavy algae infestation may require dosages up to 3 L of CHLOR LIQUID per 10,000 L of pool water. Vacuum pool when dead algae settle.

warning: DO NOT apply the product when people are in the pool. Allow product to fully disperse in water before swimming.
